result.execSummary:
The defendant Christopher J. HOWARD was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Under the Huber Law, consecutive to prison sentence in 14 CF 122.
Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant in custody.
No contest plea.  Convicted.
Court sentences defendant to ninety (90) days Manitowoc County Jail, under the Huber law, consecutive to prison sentence in 14 CF 122.  Defendant is ordered to submit a DNA sample.
Minutes.
From atty. Larson requesting adjournment of Sentencing Hearing.
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 22, 2016 at 09:30 am.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.
Request and Response Re: Copies mailed to Brown County DA
Ann Larson, public defender.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matter is continued for a Plea/Sentencing Hearing on 09-09-2016 at 3:30 p.m., Br. 3.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 cash with any previous conditions to still apply. Bail not furnished and defendant is remanded to the county jail.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail Issued.  Copy filed.
Warrant returned with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
Warrant served in Brown County. Warrant fees = $199.18 (with case no. 14CF122).
